title: What Tom Brady, Rob Gronkowski said of the Patriots getting back to Super Bowl
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: New England Patriots “Is it going to be the start of the third dynasty?

title: Patriots open as underdogs against Seahawks in Super Bowl LX predictions
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: New England Patriots The Patriots are viewed as underdogs across multiple sportsbooks after the Seahawks also punched their ticket to Super Bowl LX.
Drake Maye and the Patriots are heading to the Super Bowl.

title: A $2M schoolhouse near the Berkshires lists for the first time in over three decades
author: Megan Johnson
bullets: Real Estate 552 Twin Lakes Road is known as the Taconic School House.
Klemm Real Estate/Michael Bowman Photography Deep in the bucolic Litchfield County section of Connecticut, you’ll find the small town of Salisbury.
It’s a picturesque hideaway just a couple miles from the Massachusetts border that’s home to the Taconic School House, now on the market for $1.
